title: A Surprise in the Hospital
story: Gee, dad. Is my mom okay? Of course she is, Sharon. But we are at the hospital. It's because she is having a baby tonight. Tonight? Are you sure? Yes, Sharon. You are getting a baby sister. A baby sister? Wow! I can't wait. Your mom will be fine. Don't worry.
summary: A young girl's excitement builds as she learns that her mom is having a baby sister in the hospital.
image: An illustration of a happy family in a hospital room, with the young girl holding her dad's hand and looking at her mom.
